data.title: Love Actually Cast List
data.meta_description: Love Actually study guide contains a biography of director Richard Curtis, literature essays, quiz questions, major themes, characters, and a full summary and analysis.
data.text:
Bill Nighy

Bill Nighy is a British actor known for his roles in movies such as I Capture the Castle, Shaun of the Dead, Hot Fuzz, Pirates of the Carribean: Dead Man's Chest, Notes on a Scandal, and The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel. He won a Golden Globe for his work in the television film, Gideon's Daughter.

Andrew Lincoln

Andrew Lincoln is a British actor known for his work in Love Actually and the television show, The Walking Dead.

Keira Knightley

Keira Knightley is a British actress known for films such as Bend It Like Beckham, Pirates of the Caribbean, The Duchess, Atonement, A Dangerous Method, Anna Karenina, Colette, and Pride and Prejudice. She was nominated for an Oscar for her roles in Pride and Prejudice and The Imitation Game.

Colin Firth

Colin Firth is known for movies such as Kingsman: The Secret Service, Bridget Jones's Diary, and The King's Speech. He has won an Oscar, two Golden Globes, two BAFTA awards, and three Screen Actors Guild awards.

Lúcia Moniz

Lúcia Moniz is a Portuguese singer and actress. She represented Portugal in the Eurovision Song Contest of 1996. She has released four albums. She has acted in TV, theatre, and film.

Alan Rickman

Alan Rickman trained at the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art. He was widely recognized for films such as Harry Potter, Sense and Sensibility, Alice in Wonderland, Sweeney Todd, Galaxy Quest, Dogma, and Die Hard. He died of cancer in 2016.

Emma Thompson

Emma Thompson is a British actress. She has won an Academy Award for her role in Howards End, as well as an Academy Award for Best Adapted Screenplay for Sense and Sensibility. Her other films include Nanny McPhee, Remains of the Day, Saving Mr. Banks, Much Ado About Nothing, Wit, and Primary Colors.

Hugh Grant

Hugh Grant has won a Golden Globe and BAFTA and frequently collaborates with Richard Curtis. He is known for films such as Notting Hill, Bridget Jones's Diary, About a Boy, Music and Lyrics, Mickey Blue Eyes, Maurice, Sense and Sensibility, Nine Months, and Four Weddings and a Funeral.

Martine McCutcheon

Martine McCutcheon is an English actress and singer. She gained recognition for her role in the show EastEnders. She has released three albums as a vocalist.
